frame.name: Measure_area
frame.definition: <def-root>This transparent noun frame is concerned with <fen>Unit</fen>s for measuring the <fen>Area</fen> of regions.<ex>Hillary lives in the middle of <fex name="Count">10</fex> <t><fex name="Unit">acres</fex></t> <fex name="Occupant">of wheat</fex>.</ex><ex>Paul owns <fex name="Count">20</fex> <fex name="Unit"><t>hectares</t></fex> <fex name="Area">of land</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Unit
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Unit</fen> of measurement.<ex>Apollo grows <fex name="Count">34</fex> <t><fex name="Unit">acres</fex></t> <fex name="Occupant">of strawberries</fex>.</ex><ex>Otto owns <fex name="Count">43</fex> <t><fex name="Unit">hectares</fex></t> <fex name="Area">of land</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Area
FE.definition: <def-root>The region whose surface is being measured. <ex>Klaas has a 10 <t>acre</t> peach <fex name="Area">orchard</fex> </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Count
FE.definition: <def-root>The number of <fen>Unit</fen>s.<ex>Smiley owns <fex name="Count">fifteen</fex> <t><fex name="Unit">hectares</fex></t> <fex name="Area">of prime real estate</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Occupant
FE.definition: <def-root>Things that occupy the <fen>Area</fen> that is being measured.<ex>Swanson grows <fex name="Count">1,000</fex> <t><fex name="Unit">Acres</fex></t> <fex name="Occupant">of vegetables</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: hectare.n
lexUnit.definition: ter grootte van tienduizend vierkante meter
